full_summary:
===============

**Request for Proposal: Project and Program Advisory Services**

**Reference Number:** WS4576651752-Doc4578599186

**Publication Date:** May 17, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** July 8, 2024, at 14:00 EDT

**Selection Criteria:** The contract will be awarded to the supplier demonstrating the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Contract Details:**

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued to solicit bids from pre-qualified suppliers holding a valid Task-based supply arrangement under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply. The contract will provide Project and Program Advisory Services to the Department of Public Services and Procurement (PSPC), Human Capital Management – Pay Administration Branch.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful bidder will provide expert advisory services on an "as and when requested" basis to support project and program management, including business consulting and change management.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement opportunity is open to suppliers that have a valid agreement under the following Trade Agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Daniela Vasilescu Popa at daniela.vasilescupopa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19740526?extsite=MTk3NDA1MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
